cause.description:
Majority of anorexics out of rehab relapse with one year of release. This is because of poor outpatient programs. Mandatory outpatient programs could help greatly reduce these rates, and help all anorexia outpatients.
1. Outpatient programs should become mandatory.
cause.mission: Create mandatory associated with rehabilitation anorexia outpatient programs.
cause.name: Anorexia Outpatient Support
